Name: max_models
Description: Maximum number of models to build

Name: max_runtime_secs
Description: Controls how long the AutoML run will execute

Name: stopping_metric
Description: stops training new models in the AutoML run when the option selected for stopping_metric doesnâ€™t improve for the specified number of models

Name: stopping_rounds
Description: Specifies the metric to use for early stopping.

Name: stopping_tolerance
Description: specifies the relative tolerance for the metric-based stopping to stop the AutoML run

Name: max_after_balance_size
Description: Maximum relative size of the training data after balancing class counts

Name: nfolds
Description: Number of folds for k-folds cross validation
